name: TinyGiant
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tiny giant
des:
Play with your family, group of kids, friends or grown ups. You will share many laughs with your loving ones while playing this game together. 

The game has up to 25 levels, changing the speed and amount of actions that the people has to do. 

We hope you like it!

To open the skill say:
"Alexa open tiny giant"

To start the game say:
"Alexa let's go"

To move to the next level:
"Alexa next level"

To move to the previous level:
"Alexa previous level"

To set a specific level:
"Alexa set level to six"

To exit the game:
"Alexa quit"

Have fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
